word: The question with men and women gazing heavenward is How can I obtain the mansions for the blessed? It is by being a partaker of the divine nature. It is by escaping the \93corruption that is in the world through lust.\94 It is by entering into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, laying hold of the hope set before you in the gospel. . . . It is by being in Christ and yet led by Christ, by believing and working\97trusting in Jesus, yet working upon the plan of addition, holding on to Christ and constantly mounting upward toward God. . . .
